comment: second step of two-step reaction (see R10664, R10662+R10663)
definition: dTDP-N-hydroxy-beta-L-evernosamine + NADPH + H+ + Oxygen <=> dTDP-2,3,6-trideoxy-3-C-methyl-4-O-methyl-3-nitroso-beta-L-arabino-hexopyranose + NADP+ + 2 H2O
name: dTDP-beta-L-evernosamine,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
